content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: white_wool
inventory=[{"type": "crossbow", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "ender_pearl", "quantity": 7, "index": 29}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 4, "index": 34}, {"type": "smooth_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 12, "index": 36}, {"type": "blue_concrete_powder", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}]
thought: To craft white_wool, I need to place 4 strings in the crafting grid in a 2x2 square. I will start by moving a string from slot 34 into slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 34 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: white_wool
inventory=[{"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "crossbow", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "ender_pearl", "quantity": 7, "index": 29}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 3, "index": 34}, {"type": "smooth_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 12, "index": 36}, {"type": "blue_concrete_powder", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}]
thought: I have placed a string in slot 1, and need to place another one to the right of it, in slot 2. I will move a string from slot 34 into slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 34 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: white_wool
inventory=[{"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "crossbow", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "ender_pearl", "quantity": 7, "index": 29}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 2, "index": 34}, {"type": "smooth_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 12, "index": 36}, {"type": "blue_concrete_powder", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}]
thought: I have placed a string in slot 1 and slot 2, and need to place another one below them, in slot 4. I will move a string from slot 34 into slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 34 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: white_wool
inventory=[{"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "crossbow", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "ender_pearl", "quantity": 7, "index": 29}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "smooth_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 12, "index": 36}, {"type": "blue_concrete_powder", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}]
thought: I have placed a string in slot 1, slot 2 and slot 4, and need to place another one to the right of the string in slot 4, in slot 5. I will move a string from slot 34 into slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 34 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: white_wool
inventory=[{"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "crossbow", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "ender_pearl", "quantity": 7, "index": 29}, {"type": "smooth_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 12, "index": 36}, {"type": "blue_concrete_powder", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}]
thought: I have placed a string in slot 1, slot 2, slot 4 and slot 5, and can now craft the white_wool. I will move the white_wool from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
